content:
From: Jason Kirschenbaum <kirschenbaum.9@osu.edu>
Hi,

I'm trying to set the quick and dirty mode on the command line
interface to Isabelle, but I'm having a hard time finding out how to do
that without going through ProofGeneral. Does anyone know how to do this?

Thanks,
Jason

From: Amine Chaieb <chaieb@in.tum.de>
ML{*
set quick_and_dirty
*}

Amine.

Jason Kirschenbaum wrote:
